name: Expression SketchFlow Data File
summary: Learn about .FLOW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Expression SketchFlow projects can be exported to Microsoft Word documents (.DOCX files) for documentation and review purposes. They may also be submitted for review to collaborative team members, who can each provide design feedback using .FEEDBACK files.

description: Project file created by Expression SketchFlow, a program used for designing Web applications; stores a flow diagram of the user experience as well as layouts for each of the user interface screens (stored in .XAML files); primarily used for media and Web applications.
